title: GRAPENT Wide Leg Jeans for Women High Waisted Straight Leg Stretchy Cropped Denim Pants with Pockets Jean Trousers
description: Inseam: 26.6". The high waist of the high waisted cropped jeans for women helps to elongate the legs and create a more balanced and flattering silhouette. Wide leg design offers a modern and fashion-forward look that can elevate your outfit and make a statement.

Zipper and button closure of women wide leg jeans provides a secure and snug fit around the waist. This ensures that the jeans stay in place throughout the day, eliminating the need for constant adjustments or worry about them slipping down.

Our elastic jeans for women with four functional pockets let you have quick and easy access to your belongings. You can conveniently reach into any of the pockets without having to search through a bag or carry additional accessories. This can be particularly useful when you're on the go or need to access something quickly.

The cropped jeans for women trendy are made of skin-friendly, breathable and slightly stretchy denim fabric, making the jeans more comfortable to wear throughout the day. It reduces restrictions and allows for a greater range of motion compared to non-stretch denim.

Model measurements: Height 5'8", waist 26", hips 36.5", wearing size Small. GRAPENT wide leg pants for women run true to standard US sizes. Size Small fits size 4 to size 6, Size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, Size Large fits size 12 to size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, Size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22.
